Package actions.targeters.targets

Class RoomTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • actions.targeters.targets.RoomTarget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HavingPointLike, SuperTile, Visible, Targetable
    public class RoomTarget
extends java.lang.Object
implements Targetable, Visible, HavingPointLike, SuperTile
    This target represents a Room in the sandbox as well as targeting all players in a room
